definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
